title: Miners deep in trouble!
casefile_description: A large cobalt mine in Kongo has collapsed! Several miners are trapped (and rare metal production halted). Search and rescue!
win_result: Great success! Our agent managed to squeeze in through the rubble and delivered supplies until the cave was cleared. $BEST_ITEM was surprisingly helpful.
loss_result: Oh no! Our agent got in too late because of a failed $BEST_ITEM and the miners had already suffocated. However, this was only a minor inconvenience and electric car battery industry soon recovered.
